meta_description: "Modern 48in. vanity with quartz top, soft close hinges and slides, 3 doors, 2 drawers, and porcelain sink. Includes backsplash and cabinet hardware. ADA compliant. Made in Vietnam. 1 year warranty."
meta_title: "Marcello 48" Free Standing Vanity Set with Cabinet and White Zeus Quartz Vanity Top - Single Hole Faucet Included"
details:
Included Components:

  • Vanity set includes a 3cm eased edge White Zeus Silestone quartz top with matching quartz backsplash, a white porcelain rectangular sink and mounting brackets for easy installation. Top is pre-drilled for single hole faucet. Faucet not included.
  • Covered under 's 1 year limited warranty
  • MDF vanity cabinet with 3 doors, 2 drawers, and 2 shelves
  • Quartz vanity top with porcelain sink and backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from MDF providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • 3 door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 2 full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Drawer boxes feature English Dovetail joinery, premium undermount glides, and brushed aluminum laminate drawer liners for easy cleaning.
  • Vanity will ship fully assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Quartz vanity top includes a sink constructed of porcelain
  • Single pre-drilled faucet hole
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin workspace
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash
  • Faucet sold separately

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Number of Doors: 3
  • Number of Drawers: 2
  • Number of Shelves: 2

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 48" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 23-1/2" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Sink Dimensions: 6-7/8"H x 14-3/8"W x 19-1/2"L
  • Sink Basin Dimensions: 17-1/8" L x 12" W x 4-3/8" D
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 1
